title: Font ID?
content:

author: DjArcadian

comments.content: Erm..this looks awfully familiar...but I can’t remember the exact name. You could try [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330054934/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/pen-tip-dt/thin/) but it’s not quite the same.
TypeDNA : FontEdge provided the same answer: Tekton Regular.
